name: Sculpt people
description:
Satisfy customers in this new simulation!

- Use polymer clay to sculpt people's heads (and their pets too!)

- Make sure the result is close enough to the photo!

- Super satisfying and relaxing

- You will love the depth, customization and ability to sculpt, paint, and make it a work of art

- Amazing 3D graphics!

- Express your creativity right now

TRY IT NOW FOR FREE!
